summary_text: Microsoft's report is likely to be a reflection of whats to come. Apple was the only one among the three companies to beat on the top-line and bottom-line estimates in Q3. Amazon offered weak Q4 guidance of $140 billion to $148 billion, which was well below the analysts' estimate.

ChatGPT will generate automatic meeting notes, recommend tasks and help create meeting templates for Teams users. The premium service will cost $7 (roughly Rs. 600) per month in June before increasing to $10 in July, Microsoft said. ChatGPT Plus will be initially rolling out only for the customers in the United States.

premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July. OpenAI-owned ChatGPT will generate automatic meeting notes, recommend tasks and help create meeting templates for Teams users. Microsoft announced a multi-billion dollar investment in OpenAI earlier this month.

Teams Premium will charge $7 per person monthly as introductory pricing until June 30 and return to its standard $10 per user per month price charge on July 1. The main highlight of the premium service is the use of some intelligent features aimed at making meetings more intelligent, personalized, and protected.

In Q4 of 2022, 20% of all brand phishing attempts were related to Yahoo. The technology sector was the most likely industry to be imitated. DHL reached second position in Q4, ahead of Microsoft in third place with 11%. If its too good to be true, it almost always is.

Microsoft has introduced two new widget previews for Spotify and Phone Link. It will also introduce new treatments to the Start menu, giving users suggested actions. With this, it might mean that we are just days away from getting more widget selections for our favorite third-party applications.

The digital search company that lets users create online pinboards informed affected employees on Wednesday. The move affected less than 5 per cent of Pinterests total workers, according to a person familiar with the company. Pinterest joins a range of tech companies that have pared their ranks in recent months.

ChatGPT is a conversational AI that can chat with you, answer follow-up questions, and challenge incorrect assumptions. The new subscription plan, called ChatGPT Plus, will be available for $20 per month. OpenAI recently launched a new tool called The AI Text Classifier; which can detect AI-generated content.

The premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July. Microsoft announced a multi-billion dollar investment in OpenAI earlier this month. The chatbot, which can produce prose or poetry on command, is at the forefront of generative AI.

The premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July, Microsoft said. OpenAI-owned ChatGPT will generate automatic meeting notes, recommend tasks and help create meeting templates for Teams users. Microsoft announced a multi-billion dollar investment in OpenAI earlier this month.

The premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July, Microsoft said. OpenAI-owned ChatGPT will generate automatic meeting notes, recommend tasks and help create meeting templates for Teams users. Microsoft announced a multi-billion dollar investment in OpenAI earlier this month.

ChatGPT, the popular chatbot from OpenAI, is estimated to have reached 100 million monthly active users in January, just two months after launch. The report, citing data from analytics firm Similar Web, said about 13 million unique visitors used ChatGPT per day in January. It took TikTok about nine months after its global launch to add 100 million users.

Microsoft Corp (MSFT.O) on Wednesday rolled out a premium Teams messaging offering powered by ChatGPT. The premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July. Microsoft announced a multi-billion dollar investment in OpenAI earlier this month.

Microsoft and OpenAI said they are committed to building AI systems and products that are trustworthy and safe. Neither ChatGPT nor Googles creative writing version comes close to what a human can do, Sloan said. Facebook parent Meta and Amazon have also built their own big models, which can improve voice assistants like Alexa.

Premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July. Microsoft announced a multi-billion dollar investment in OpenAI earlier this month. The chatbot, which can produce prose or poetry on command, is at the forefront of generative AI, a space where more and more big tech companies are funneling their resources.

The premium service will cost $7 per month. It will be available to users in the U.S. and Canada. The service will be rolled out to other countries later this year. It is the latest in a long line of AI-powered products from Google and Facebook.

Google is testing a chatbot rival known as Apprentice Bard primarily based on Googles LaMDA conversational expertise to supply question-and-answer search. Microsoft introduced on Jan. 23 its third spherical of funding in ChatGPT-creator OpenAI. The corporate can be planning to launch a GPT-4 model of its Bing search engine within the coming weeks, in response to Semafor.

Microsoft rolls out a premium Teams messaging offering powered by ChatGPT. The premium service will cost $7 per month in June before increasing to $10 in July. The chatbot, which can produce prose or poetry on command, is at the forefront of generative AI.

New Teams Premium tier adds exclusive powers enabled by OpenAIs GPT 3.5 language model. It can watch meetings with Teams video feature and automatically generate meeting notes and recommended tasks. The new tier will be $10 per month per user starting on June 30th, but you can get a cheaper preview for $7 until then.

For the 191 S&P 500 companies that have reported Q4 results, total earnings are up +1.5% from the same period last year on +7.2% higher revenues. The proportion of these 191 index members beating both EPS and revenue estimates at 53.4% compares to the average for the preceding 20 quarters of 60.1%.

Microsoft revises multi-channel advertising approach and discontinues bid modifiers for audience ads. Microsoft says their Search and Audience networks can reach over a billion people. Users who view a brands ad on both networks visit the website 2.6 times more frequently compared to those who only see the ad on search.

Twitter unceremoniously shut off access to most third-party apps nine days ago. Google is to lay off 12,000 workers, writes CEO Sundar Pichai. Microsoft is "focusing on our short- and long-term opportunity", which is to say it's laying off 10,000 people.

Google is testing a chatbot rival called Apprentice Bard based on Googles LaMDA conversational technology to offer question-and-answer search. Microsoft announced on Jan. 23 its third round of investment in ChatGPT-creator OpenAI. Others planning to release AI bot services next month include Chinese internet search giant Baidu, and Silicon Valley-based enterprise software platform C3.ai.

Version 0.67.0 is now available for download with numerous fixes, improvements, and minor changes. The highlight of this release is the availability of the Quick access system tray launcher. All PowerToys registry entries are moved from machine scope (HKLM) to user scope (HKCU)

Microsoft said on Tuesday that it has taken steps to disable fake Microsoft Partner Network (MPN) accounts used to build applications OAuth malicious. The applications created by these malefactors were then used in a consent phishing campaign, which tricked users into granting permissions to the fraudulent apps. The Windows maker said it became aware of the campaign on December 15, 2022.

Microsoft is working on major File Explorer upgrades. A part of those upgrades is making tabs more usable and less crippled. Customers running Windows 11 build 25290 can now turn on a feature ID responsible for dragging tabs. You can disable the ID by replacing /enable with /disable in the command.

ChatGPT Plus subscription promises access to the AI even during peak hours. Microsoft will integrate a faster iteration of ChatGPT to improve the in-house Bing search engine. OpenAI expects to bring nearly $200 million in revenue this year and to touch the $1 billion figure by 2024.

ChatGPT Plus, for $20 per month, will be available exclusively in the U.S. The AI chat bot, which debuted in November, is able to generate text in response to prompts. The company said its plans are to refine and expand while teasing that soon it would launch ChatGPT API waitlist.

Microsoft's Xbox support page currently shows that the Xbox Live gaming online service is having some issues. The specific message states, "You may have problems joining multiplayer games, or finding other players." This is being labeled as a "major outage" by the company. So far we don't know why this online matchmaking issue is happening.

Microsoft has released a new build of Windows 11 for the Dev Channel. There are a number of fixes and improvements to the Start menu and Windows Spotlight. Some issues have been fixed in this build, but others have not been fixed. The latest build is available now on the Microsoft Store.

Bing search engine will incorporate a faster, richer version of ChatGPT called GPT-4 into its product in the coming weeks. OpenAI is said to be planning to launch a mobile chat app and test a new feature in its Dall-E image-generating software.

ChatGPT was developed by a previously unknown startup called OpenAI, and today Microsoft is investing $10 billion in it. It took it just five days to cross the one million user barrier, which means it did it 60 times faster than Facebook. The bot was able to pass MBA exams and an exam giving a licence to practice medicine in the US. It is impossible to verify within the code what this AI has sculpted there.

Douglas County PUD is working replace transmission lines to accommodate an extremely heavy load of power Microsoft will require for its new data center. The process will require a $25,000 prepayment to the Bonneville Power Administration for design, material and labor so the Administration can make upgrades at its Valhalla Switchyard.

Office 365 gives you everything you need to get your work done anytime, anywhere. This cloud service meets your needs for robust security, 24/7 reliability, and user productivity. With Office 365, youll always have the latest Office version and can create, edit, and share files in real-time.

A new and improved version of ChatGPT is set to be rolled out in the coming weeks. Microsoft is eager to integrate the technology in its Bing search engine in the hopes that conversational AI will help it catch Google. The company has invested billions in OpenAI, with its most recent investment coming just last week.

Microsoft, Apple, Google, Mozilla, and several other companies announced a joint initiative to improve cross-browser interoperability. Dubbed "Interop 2022," the program prioritized specific browser areas that matter the most to web developers. Fast forward to 2023, and now Microsoft and other companies are announcing the Interop 2023 project.

Report: Microsoft will integrate a new version of ChatGPT known as GPT-4 in the coming weeks. The new AI tool is said to be significantly faster than the current AI model that powers ChatG PT. Microsoft and OpenAI denied commenting when asked by Semafor.

A Reddit user published a photo of their Windows 10 computer with a full-screen Windows 11 ad offering to upgrade. The ad tries to promote Windows 11 by claiming that the operating system "is now unlocked" The only way to reject the offer is to click a small "Keep Windows 10" link on the bottom of the screen.

Microsoft announced Teams Premium, its new and more expensive SKU of Teams geared towards enterprises who want more functionalities. Today, Teams Premium is generally available along with advanced webinars. Microsoft is actually taking away some existing features from Teams and integrating them exclusively into Team Premium.

Phone Link and Widgets are now rolling out preview versions of their widgets as well. We are starting a new exploration of badging on the Start menu with two new treatments that some Insiders in the Dev Channel will see. We fixed an issue causing some people to not get a consistent refresh of images on a daily basis.

Gamers claim they'll be affected by Microsoft's planned buyout of Activision Blizzard. Microsoft's lawyers want the suit to be dismissed entirely. A motion-to-dismiss hearing is scheduled for March 9. The lawyers want a trial in April (2023) and immediate discovery.

The Witcher 2, Prince of Persia, Knights of the Old Republic 2, and.Lost Odyssey will still be available for download. If the game has a backward compatible- or enhanced version available on the Xbox One or Xbox Series X|S stores, those will also remain available for purchase after Feb. 7, 2023.

The removals will start on February 7. Once purchased, you can always redownload the games or any other previously purchased games from your Xbox 360 Download History. This will not affect the game if they are currently available on the Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S stores.

IOD is a digital media company based in San Francisco, California. The company has been in business for over 20 years. It was founded in 2007 to provide digital media to the world. It is now expanding into new areas, including social media and digital media. It also has its own digital media platform, called IOD.

On February 7, Microsoft plans to delist more than 40 downloadable Xbox 360 games. Some of these games will still be available on Xbox One and Xbox Series X consoles. The situation is not as catastrophic as it could be, as most of the games are either backwards compatible or have readily available versions.

More than one hundred different cyber criminal gangs are actively conducting ransomware attacks. Attacks are being helped along by how ransomware groups offer ransomware-as-a-service (RaaS) schemes. Phishing attacks are the most common means of attackers gaining initial access to networks. Malvertising and drive-by-downloads are also becoming more common.

Xbox Game Pass saw a growth in users in Q2 of the 2023 fiscal year, but the number of subscribers alone does not allow for a definite picture of its performance. The problem, according to DFC, is that Microsoft is having to give away too many content to generate revenue. Even if Nintendo Switch Online is not comparable to the Game Pass for content, it seems to have found the right formula for consumers.

EU antitrust enforcers laid out the reasons why the deal could threaten fair competition on the video game market. Microsoft said it would be committed to finding a path forward for the deal. The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has argued that Microsoft had a history of buying companies and restricting access to popular titles.

Microsoft to bring new look to Teams Rooms on Windows and Android. Users will get improved visual cues throughout the experience that will make it easier and more intuitive to interact with the console. The update is expected to be available by the end of the quarter, the tech giant said.

Kelly Bissell, vice-president of Microsoft Security, spoke at the siberX CISO Forum Canada on Tuesday. He urged CISOs to work with police agencies if their IT environments are compromised. Bissell: CISOs should move away from best-of-breed solutions to a platform and move workloads to the cloud.
